column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The food is very good.  My friend had the steak
column2: and as a steak expert of sorts
column3: he was singly impressed with the cut of meat and the way it was simply seasoned
column5: and cooked.  I don't know if Bavette's qualifies as a "steak house" but they certainly do steak very
column6: very well. He had the Chicago Cut
column7: which we both recommend since I was able to taste it.
